title: FDA Finalizes Guidelines for AI-Generated Pharmaceutical Marketing Content
summary: The FDA releases long-awaited guidance on using generative AI in pharma advertising, requiring human review of all AI-produced claims while permitting AI-assisted creative production workflows.

title: Pfizer's AI Marketing Engine Personalizes HCP Outreach Across 50 Therapeutic Areas
summary: Pfizer's centralized AI platform tailors messaging, content format, and channel selection for healthcare professional engagement, improving email response rates by 35% across its product portfolio.

title: Digital Health Advertising Grows 25% as Patients Seek Information Online First
summary: Pharma and health brands increase digital ad budgets as research shows 78% of patients now start their healthcare journey with an online search, making digital the primary awareness channel.

title: Veeva CRM's AI Next Best Action Transforms Medical Affairs Engagement
summary: Veeva Systems introduces AI-driven next-best-action recommendations for medical science liaisons, helping life sciences companies optimize HCP interactions while maintaining regulatory compliance.

title: Biotech Startups Turn to Influencer Marketing for Rare Disease Awareness
summary: Emerging biotech firms partner with patient advocates and micro-influencers to raise awareness for rare diseases, finding that authentic patient stories outperform traditional condition-awareness ads.

title: Compliance-First AI: How Life Sciences Brands Navigate MLR Review With Generative Tools
summary: Pharma marketers adopt AI tools with built-in medical-legal-regulatory guardrails, cutting MLR review cycles from weeks to days while ensuring all generated content meets FDA and EMA standards.
